meanings.definition: The quality of being excellent or superior in quality.
meanings.sent1: Her choiceness in selecting gifts always impresses everyone.
meanings.sent2: The choiceness of the fabric made the dress stand out.
meanings.sent3: The choiceness of the cake was evident from the first bite.
meanings.sent4: His choiceness in music was like a symphony to our ears.
meanings.sent5: The choiceness of the sunset left us in awe.

meanings.definition: The act of making a careful selection or decision.
meanings.sent1: The choiceness of her outfit reflected her attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: His choiceness in choosing the right words for the speech was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The choiceness of his movie selection led to an unexpected adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her choiceness in picking the right path guided us to success.
meanings.sent5: The choiceness of his decision-making process was like a well-crafted puzzle.
